title: HTAP Databases Are Dead
description: Article URL: https://www.mooncake.dev/blog/htap-is-dead Comments URL: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=44121177 Points: 26 # Comments: 10

excerpt: I spent the last 10 years building, and then rescuing HTAP databases. Their spirit lives on in the Lakehouse today.
